text: I don’t want to sound too harsh, I just came to the conclusion that pip works badly as it failed to install dask. Miniconda worked fine though.

text: Are you living in US East? It seems to me that <http://pkg.julialang.org|pkg.julialang.org> has backends in different regions, and one of them (<https://us-east2.pkg.julialang.org/>) is down.
